trans-unit.source: Provides information about a specific culture (called a *locale* for unmanaged code development).
trans-unit.target: 提供有关特定区域性（对于非托管代码开发，则称为“区域设置”）的信息。

trans-unit.source: The information includes the names for the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, the sort order of strings, and formatting for dates and numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这些信息包括区域性的名称、书写系统、使用的日历、字符串的排序顺序以及对日期和数字的格式化设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class provides culture-specific information, such as the language, sublanguage, country/region, calendar, and conventions associated with a particular culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类提供区域性特定信息，如语言、 子语言、 国家/地区、 日历和与特定区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: This class also provides access to culture-specific instances of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>, <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>, and <xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类还提供对区域性特定的实例访问<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>， <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>，和<xref:System.Globalization.TextInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: These objects contain the information required for culture-specific operations, such as casing, formatting dates and numbers, and comparing strings.
trans-unit.target: 这些对象包含特定于区域性的操作，如大小写、 格式化日期和数字和比较字符串所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class is used either directly or indirectly by classes that format, parse, or manipulate culture-specific data, such as <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>, and the numeric types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类直接或间接类使用的格式、 分析，或处理特定于区域性的数据，如<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.DateTime>， <xref:System.DateTimeOffset>，与数值类型。

trans-unit.source: Culture names and identifiers
trans-unit.target: 区域性名称和标识符

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class specifies a unique name for each culture, based on RFC 4646.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类指定对于每个区域性，根据 RFC 4646 的唯一名称。

trans-unit.source: The name is a combination of an ISO 639 two-letter lowercase culture code associated with a language and an ISO 3166 two-letter uppercase subculture code associated with a country or region.
trans-unit.target: 名称是一个与语言相关的 ISO 639 两个字母小写区域性代码以及与国家 / 地区关联的 ISO 3166 双字母大写子区域性代码组合。

trans-unit.source: In addition, for apps that target [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later and are running under Windows 10 or later, culture names that correspond to valid BCP-47 language tags are supported.
trans-unit.target: 此外，对于面向的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或更高版本和在 Windows 10 或更高版本，对应于有效 bcp-47 语言标记受支持的区域性名称运行。

trans-unit.source: When a culture name is passed to a class constructor or a method such as <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, its case is not significant.
trans-unit.target: 当区域性名称传递给类构造函数或方法如<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，其大小写并不重要。

trans-unit.source: The format for the culture name based on RFC 4646 is *languagecode2*>-*country/regioncode2*, where *languagecode2* is the two-letter language code and *country/regioncode2* is the two-letter subculture code.
trans-unit.target: 根据 RFC 4646 的区域性名称的格式是*languagecode2*>-*country/regioncode2*，其中*languagecode2*是两个字母的语言代码和*country/regioncode2*是两个字母子区域性代码。

trans-unit.source: Examples include ja-JP for Japanese (Japan) and en-US for English (United States).
trans-unit.target: 示例包括 JA-JP EN-US 日语 （日本） 以及为英语 （美国）。

trans-unit.source: In cases where a two-letter language code is not available, a three-letter code derived from ISO 639-2 is used.
trans-unit.target: 在两个字母的语言代码不可用的情况下，使用派生自 ISO 639-2 的三个字母代码。

trans-unit.source: Note that some culture names also specify an ISO 15924 script.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些区域性名称还指定 ISO 15924 书写符号。

trans-unit.source: For example, Cyrl specifies the Cyrillic script and Latn specifies the Latin script.
trans-unit.target: 例如，符号指定西里尔文的脚本和 Latn 指定拉丁脚本。

trans-unit.source: A culture name that includes a script uses the pattern *languagecode2*-*scripttag*-*country/regioncode2*.
trans-unit.target: 包含的脚本的区域性名称使用模式*languagecode2*-*scripttag*-*country/regioncode2*。

trans-unit.source: An example of this type of culture name is uz-Cyrl-UZ for Uzbek (Cyrillic, Uzbekistan).
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的区域性名称的一个示例是 uz 符号-UZ 为乌兹别克语 （西里尔文，乌兹别克斯坦）。

trans-unit.source: On Windows operating systems before Windows Vista, a culture name that includes a script uses the pattern *languagecode2*-*country/regioncode2*-*scripttag*, for example, uz-UZ-Cyrl for Uzbek (Cyrillic, Uzbekistan).
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 之前的 Windows 操作系统，包括脚本的区域性名称使用模式*languagecode2*-*country/regioncode2* - *scripttag*，例如，uz UZ-符号的乌兹别克语 （西里尔文，乌兹别克斯坦）。

trans-unit.source: A neutral culture is specified by only the two-letter lowercase language code.
trans-unit.target: 只有两个字母小写语言代码指定非特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: For example, fr specifies the neutral culture for French, and de specifies the neutral culture for German.
trans-unit.target: 例如，fr 为法语指定非特定区域性和 de 代表德语指定非特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: There are two culture names that contradict this rule.
trans-unit.target: 有两个不符合此规则的区域性名称。

trans-unit.source: The cultures Chinese (Simplified), named zh-Hans, and Chinese (Traditional), named zh-Hant, are neutral cultures.
trans-unit.target: 中文 （简体），名为中文-Hans 和中文 （繁体），名为此不同的区域性是非特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: The culture names represent the current standard and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names zh-CHS and zh-CHT.
trans-unit.target: 区域性名称表示当前的标准，并且应使用，除非你有使用较旧名称 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 的原因。

trans-unit.source: A culture identifier is a standard international numeric abbreviation and has the components necessary to uniquely identify one of the installed cultures.
trans-unit.target: 区域性标识符是标准的国际号码缩写，具有唯一标识一个已安装的区域性所必需的组件。

trans-unit.source: Your application can use predefined culture identifiers or define custom identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序可以使用预定义的区域性标识符，或定义自定义的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Certain predefined culture names and identifiers are used by this and other classes in the <xref:System.Globalization?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 某些预定义的区域性名称和标识符由这和中的其他类<xref:System.Globalization?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Detailed culture information appears in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
trans-unit.target: 详细的区域性信息将出现在[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。

trans-unit.source: Remember that the culture names and identifiers represent only a subset of cultures that can be found on a particular computer.
trans-unit.target: 请记住的区域性名称和标识符表示找不到特定计算机的区域性的一个子集。

trans-unit.source: Windows versions or service packs can change the available cultures.
trans-unit.target: Windows 版本或 service pack 可以更改的可用的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Applications add custom cultures using the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序添加自定义区域性使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder>类。

trans-unit.source: Users add their own custom cultures using the Microsoft Locale Builder tool.
trans-unit.target: 用户将添加使用 Microsoft 区域设置生成器工具自己自定义区域性。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Locale Builder is written in managed code using the `CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder` class.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 区域设置生成器编写在托管的代码中使用`CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder`类。

trans-unit.source: Several distinct names are closely associated with a culture, notably the names associated with the following class members:
trans-unit.target: 多个不同的名称是该区域性中值得注意的是与下面的类成员关联的名称与紧密关联：

trans-unit.source: Invariant, neutral, and specific cultures
trans-unit.target: 固定，非特定，和特定区域性

trans-unit.source: The cultures are generally grouped into three sets: invariant cultures, neutral cultures, and specific cultures.
trans-unit.target: 区域性通常分为三个集合： 固定区域性、 非特定区域性和特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: An invariant culture is culture-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 固定区域性是不区分区域性的。

trans-unit.source: Your application specifies the invariant culture by name using an empty string ("") or by its identifier.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序指定固定区域性的名称，使用空字符串 ("") 或由其标识符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A> defines an instance of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A> 定义固定区域性的实例。

trans-unit.source: It is associated with the English language but not with any country/region.
trans-unit.target: 关联与英语语言，但不是能与任何国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: It is used in almost any method in the `Globalization` namespace that requires a culture.
trans-unit.target: 在几乎任何方法中使用`Globalization`要求区域性的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A neutral culture is a culture that is associated with a language but not with a country/region.
trans-unit.target: 非特定区域性是一个相关联的区域性了一种语言，但不是能与国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: A specific culture is a culture that is associated with a language and a country/region.
trans-unit.target: 特定区域性是一个与一种语言和国家/地区关联的区域性。

trans-unit.source: For example, fr is the neutral name for the French culture, and fr-FR is the name of the specific French (France) culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，fr 是对于法语区域性中，非特定语言的名称和 FR-FR 是特定的法语 （法国） 区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Note that Chinese (Simplified) and Chinese (Traditional) are also considered neutral cultures.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，中文 （简体） 和中文 （繁体） 也将被视为非特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: Creating an instance of a <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo> class for a neutral culture is not recommended because the data it contains is arbitrary.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>建议不要非特定区域性，因为它包含的数据是任意类。

trans-unit.source: To display and sort data, specify both the language and region.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示和对数据进行排序，指定的语言和区域。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo> object created for a neutral culture returns only the country and does not include the region.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Name%2A>属性<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo>创建非特定区域性返回仅在国家/地区，并且不包含区域的对象。

trans-unit.source: The defined cultures have a hierarchy in which the parent of a specific culture is a neutral culture and the parent of a neutral culture is the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 定义的区域性具有层次结构中的特定区域性的父是非特定区域性和非特定区域性的父级是固定的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent%2A> property contains the neutral culture associated with a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent%2A>属性包含与特定区域性关联的非特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: Custom cultures should define the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent%2A> property in conformance with this pattern.
trans-unit.target: 自定义区域性应<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Parent%2A>符合此模式的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the resources for a specific culture are not available in the operating system, the resources for the associated neutral culture are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定区域性的资源不在操作系统中可用，使用关联的非特定区域性的资源。

trans-unit.source: If the resources for the neutral culture are not available, the resources embedded in the main assembly are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果非特定区域性的资源不可用，将使用嵌入到主程序集中的资源。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the resource fallback process, see [Packaging and Deploying Resources](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md).
trans-unit.target: 资源回退进程的详细信息，请参阅[打包和部署资源](~/docs/framework/resources/packaging-and-deploying-resources-in-desktop-apps.md)。

trans-unit.source: The list of locales in the Windows API is slightly different from the list of cultures supported by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Windows API 中的区域设置的列表是略有不同的.NET Framework 支持的区域性列表。

trans-unit.source: If interoperability with Windows is required, for example, through the p/invoke mechanism, the application should use a specific culture that is defined for the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 如果与 Windows 互操作性是必需的例如，通过 p/invoke 机制中，应用程序应使用特定区域性定义的操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Use of the specific culture ensures consistency with the equivalent Windows locale, which is identified with a locale identifier that is the same as <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定区域性，可以确保与等效的 Windows 区域设置，会使用相同的区域设置标识符来标识保持一致<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> or a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> can be created only for the invariant culture or for specific cultures, not for neutral cultures.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>只能用于固定区域性或特定区域性 （而不能为非特定区域性） 可以创建。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is the <xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar> but the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not set to zh-TW, then <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.NativeCalendarName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> return an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是<xref:System.Globalization.TaiwanCalendar>但<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>未设置为 ZH-TW，然后<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.NativeCalendarName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEraName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetAbbreviatedEraName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>返回空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Custom cultures
trans-unit.target: 自定义区域性

trans-unit.source: In addition to the predefined cultures supported by the Windows operating system and the .NET Framework, the .NET Framework supports three types of custom cultures:
trans-unit.target: 除了 Windows 操作系统和.NET Framework 支持的预定义区域性，.NET Framework 支持三种类型的自定义区域性：

trans-unit.source: New cultures that supplement the cultures available in Windows or the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 新补充 Windows 或.NET Framework 中可用的区域性的区域性。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application could install a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the fj-FJ (or Fijan (Fiji)) culture on a system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，应用程序无法安装<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示 FJ-FJ （或 Fijan （斐济）） 区域性的系统上的对象。

trans-unit.source: Replacement cultures whose properties are different from the properties of the standard cultures supported by Windows and the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 替换区域性所其属性不同于 Windows 和.NET Framework 支持的标准区域性的属性。

trans-unit.source: Standard cultures with user overrides.
trans-unit.target: 通过用户重写的标准区域性。

trans-unit.source: The user can use the **Region and Language** application in **Control Panel** to customize an existing culture's property values.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以使用**地区和语言**应用程序中**控制面板**以自定义现有区域性的属性值。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder> class to define, save, and register custom cultures that either supplement or replace existing cultures.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder>类来定义、 保存和注册自定义区域性补充或替换现有的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method creates a Locale Data Markup Language (LDML) file that can be used to install a custom culture on target systems.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Save%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法创建可以用于在目标系统上安装一个自定义区域性的区域设置数据标记语言 (LDML) 文件。

trans-unit.source: For step-by step information on using the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder> class to create a new or replacement culture, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关分步步骤使用信息<xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder>创建新的类或替换区域性，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder>类主题。

trans-unit.source: Because the .NET Framework supports custom cultures, you should consider the following when working with culture-specific data:
trans-unit.target: 由于.NET Framework 支持自定义区域性，你应使用特定于区域性的数据时考虑以下：

trans-unit.source: Custom cultures can have values that exceed the ranges of the predefined cultures.
trans-unit.target: 自定义区域性可以具有超过预定义的区域性的范围的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, some cultures have unusually long month names, unexpected date or time formats, or other unusual data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某些区域性具有极长的月份名称、 意外的日期或时间格式或其他不常见的数据。

trans-unit.source: When you display culture-specific data in the user interface, you should respect the user's customizations; for example, the user might want a 24-hour clock or a yyyyMMdd date format.
trans-unit.target: 当用户界面中显示特定于区域性的数据时，应遵守用户的自定义项;例如，用户可能需要 24 小时制或者 yyyyMMdd 日期格式。

trans-unit.source: Remember that custom cultures override default values.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，自定义区域性会重写默认值。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot consider culture data to be stable.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你不能考虑区域性数据保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Country names, number and date formats, and spellings may change in the future.
trans-unit.target: 国家/地区名称、 数字和日期格式和拼写在将来可能会更改。

trans-unit.source: If you want to serialize culture-sensitive data such as date and time strings to be passed to the date and time parsing functions, you should use the invariant culture or a specific .
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要序列化 （如日期和时间字符串） 传递给日期和时间分析函数的区分区域性的数据，应使用固定区域性或特定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A> property value of custom cultures installed on a system includes the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and custom cultures are assigned an <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A> property value of `LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED` (0x1000, or 4096).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A>属性值的自定义区域性的系统上安装包括<xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>分配标志和自定义区域性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A>属性值`LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED`（0x1000 或 4096）。

trans-unit.source: Note that, starting with Windows 10, this value is also assigned to system-defined cultures that lack complete cultural data.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，从 Windows 10 开始，此值还将分配给缺少完整区域性的数据的系统定义的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic culture data
trans-unit.target: 动态区域性数据

trans-unit.source: Except for the invariant culture, culture data is dynamic.
trans-unit.target: 固定区域性，除区域性数据是动态的。

trans-unit.source: This is true even for the predefined cultures.
trans-unit.target: 这是 true，即使对于的预定义区域性。

trans-unit.source: For example, countries or regions adopt new currencies, change their spellings of words, or change their preferred calendar, and culture definitions change to track this.
trans-unit.target: 例如，国家或地区采用新货币、 更改其单词的拼写或更改首选的日历，而区域性定义更改跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Custom cultures are subject to change without notice, and any specific culture might be overridden by a custom replacement culture.
trans-unit.target: 自定义区域性可能有所更改，恕不另行通知，并通过自定义的替换区域性中任何特定区域性可能会被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Also, as discussed below, an individual user can override cultural preferences.
trans-unit.target: 此外，按如下所述，单个用户可以重写区域性首选项。

trans-unit.source: Applications should always obtain culture data at run time.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应始终在运行时获取区域性数据。

trans-unit.source: When saving data, your application should use the invariant culture, a binary format, or a specific culture-independent format.
trans-unit.target: 保存数据时，你的应用程序应使用固定区域性、 二进制格式或特定于区域性的格式。

trans-unit.source: Data saved according to the current values associated with a particular culture, other than the invariant culture, might become unreadable or might change in meaning if that culture changes.
trans-unit.target: 根据特定区域性，而非固定区域性，与关联的当前值保存的数据可能会变得不可读，或如果该区域性更改可能会更改中的含义。

trans-unit.source: The current culture and current UI culture
trans-unit.target: 当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性

trans-unit.source: Every thread in a .NET Framework application has a current culture and a current UI culture.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 应用程序中的每个线程都具有当前区域性和当前的 UI 区域性。

trans-unit.source: The current culture determines the formatting conventions for dates, times, numbers, and currency values, the sort order of text, casing conventions, and the ways in which strings are compared.
trans-unit.target: 当前区域性的日期、 时间、 数字和货币值、 文本、 大小写约定和比较字符串的方式的排序顺序确定的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: The current UI culture is used to retrieve culture-specific resources at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 当前 UI 区域性用于检索在运行时的区域性特定资源。

trans-unit.source: For information on how the current and current UI culture is determined on a per-thread basis, see the [Culture and threads](#Threads) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将当前和当前 UI 区域性确定基于每个线程的信息，请参阅[区域性和线程](#Threads)部分。

trans-unit.source: For information on how the current and current UI culture is determined on threads executing in a new application domain, and on threads that cross application domain boundaries, see the [Culture and application domains](#AppDomain) section.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何将当前和当前 UI 区域性确定线程上执行一个新的应用程序域中和跨应用程序域边界的线程上请参阅[区域性和应用程序域](#AppDomain)部分。

trans-unit.source: For information on how the current and current is determined on threads performing task-based asynchronous operations, see the [Culture and task-based asynchronous operations](#Async) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何执行基于任务的异步操作的线程上确定当前和当前的信息，请参阅[区域性和基于任务的异步操作](#Async)部分。

trans-unit.source: For more detailed information on the current culture, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细的当前区域性的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性主题。

trans-unit.source: For more detailed information on the current UI culture, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细的当前 UI 区域性的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性主题。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the current and current UI cultures
trans-unit.target: 检索当前和当前 UI 区域性

trans-unit.source: You can get a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the current culture in either of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示当前区域性中两种方法之一：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the [Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture](<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture>) property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的[Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture](<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture>)属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves both property values, compares them to show that they are equal, and displays the name of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索这两个属性值，将它们以显示它们相等，并显示当前区域性的名称进行比较。

trans-unit.source: You can get a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the current UI culture in either of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示当前 UI 区域性中两种方法之一：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the [Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture](<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture>) property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的[Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture](<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture>)属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves both property values, compares them to show that they are equal, and displays the name of the current UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索这两个属性值，将它们以显示它们相等，并显示当前 UI 区域性的名称进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Setting the current and current UI cultures
trans-unit.target: 设置当前和当前 UI 区域性

trans-unit.source: To change the culture and UI culture of a thread, do the following:
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的区域性和 UI 线程区域性，请执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents that culture by calling a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class constructor and passing it the name of the culture.
trans-unit.target: 实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象通过调用表示该区域性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类构造函数并将其传递的区域性名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor instantiates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that reflects user overrides if the new culture is the same as the current Windows culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>如果新区域性等同于当前的 Windows 区域性，将重写反映用户的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor allows you to specify whether the newly instantiated <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object reflects user overrides if the new culture is the same as the current Windows culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数，可指定是否新实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象反映是否新区域性等同于当前的 Windows 区域性，将重写用户。

trans-unit.source: Assign the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 分配<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象传递给<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, for apps running on the version 4.6 or later of the desktop .NET Framework, you can also assign the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，对于版本 4.6 或更高版本的桌面的.NET Framework 上运行的应用程序，你还可以分配<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象传递给<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: If it is anything other than the French (France) culture, it changes the current culture to French (France).
trans-unit.target: 如果它是法语 （法国） 区域性之外的任何内容，但它会将当前区域性更改为法语 （法国）。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it changes the current culture to French (Luxembourg).
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将当前区域性更改为法语 （卢森堡）。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: If it is anything other the Slovenian (Slovenia) culture, it changes the current culture to Slovenian (Slovenia).
trans-unit.target: 如果它是任何其他斯洛文尼亚语 （斯洛文尼亚） 区域性中，它将当前区域性更改为斯洛文尼亚语 （斯洛文尼亚）。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it changes the current culture to Croatian (Croatia).
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将当前区域性更改为克罗地亚语 （克罗地亚）。

trans-unit.source: Getting all cultures
trans-unit.target: 获取所有区域性

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an array specific categories of cultures or of all the cultures available on the local computer by calling the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用检索数组特定的类别或在本地计算机上可用的所有区域性的区域性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can retrieve custom cultures, specific cultures, or neutral cultures either alone or in combination.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以检索自定义区域性、 特定区域性或非特定区域性，单独使用或组合中。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A> method twice, first with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member to retrieve all custom cultures, and then with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member to retrieve all replacement cultures.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A>方法两次，第一个具有<xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举成员，以检索所有自定义区域性，且然后<xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>要检索所有替换区域性的枚举成员。

trans-unit.source: Culture and threads
trans-unit.target: 区域性和线程

trans-unit.source: When a new application thread is started, its current culture and current UI culture are defined by the current system culture, and not by the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 当启动新的应用程序线程时，其当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性定义由当前系统区域性，而不是当前线程区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the difference.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例演示了差异。

trans-unit.source: It sets the current culture and current UI culture of an application thread to the French (France) culture (fr-FR).
trans-unit.target: 它的当前区域性和设置的一个应用程序线程的当前 UI 区域性为法语 （法国） 区域性 (FR-FR)。

trans-unit.source: If the current culture is already fr-FR, the example sets it to the English (United States) culture (en-US).
trans-unit.target: 如果当前区域性已 FR-FR，则会将其设置为英语 （美国） 区域性 (EN-US)。

trans-unit.source: It displays three random numbers as currency values and then creates a new thread, which, in turn, displays three more random numbers as currency values.
trans-unit.target: 它显示为货币值的三个随机数字，然后创建一个新线程，后者反过来，将三个更随机数字显示为货币值。

trans-unit.source: But as the output from the example shows, the currency values displayed by the new thread do not reflect the formatting conventions of the French (France) culture, unlike the output from the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: 但作为的示例所示的输出，显示新线程的货币值不能反映的法语 （法国） 区域性，与主应用程序线程的输出不同的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the most common way to ensure that the main application thread shares the same culture with all other worker threads is to pass either the name of the application-wide culture or a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the application-wide culture to a <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart?displayProperty=nameWithType> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 在之前的.NET framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、 最常用的方法，以确保主应用程序线程与所有其他工作线程共享相同的区域性是将整个应用程序范围区域性名称传递或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象表示应用程序范围内的区域性<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart?displayProperty=nameWithType>委托。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses this approach to ensure that the currency values displayed by two threads reflect the formatting conventions of the same culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用此方法以确保显示由两个线程的货币值反映相同的区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: You can set the culture and UI culture of thread pool threads in a similar manner by calling the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置区域性和 UI 区域性的线程池线程类似的方式通过调用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can set the culture and UI culture of all threads in an application domain more directly by assigning a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents that culture to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以设置区域性和 UI 区域性所有线程的应用程序域中更直接通过分配<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示该区域性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses these properties to ensure that all threads in the default application domain share the same culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用这些属性以确保默认应用程序域中的所有线程都共享相同的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> properties are static members, they define the default culture and default UI culture only for the application domain that is current at the time these property values are set.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>属性都是静态成员，他们会定义的默认区域性和仅对是在设置这些属性值时最新的应用程序域的默认 UI 区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the next section, [Culture and application domains](#AppDomain).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅下一部分中，[区域性和应用程序域](#AppDomain)。

trans-unit.source: When you assign values to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> properties, the culture and UI culture of the threads in the application domain also change if they have not explicitly been assigned a culture.
trans-unit.target: 将分配到的值时<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>属性、 区域性和 UI 区域性的应用程序域中的线程还更改如果它们不显式分配了区域性。

trans-unit.source: However, these threads reflect the new culture settings only while they execute in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些线程反映新的区域性设置，仅当它们在当前的应用程序域中执行时。

trans-unit.source: If these threads execute in another application domain, their culture becomes the default culture defined for that application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果在另一个应用程序域中执行这些线程，其区域性将成为为该应用程序域定义的默认区域性。

trans-unit.source: As a result, we recommend that you always set the culture of the main application thread, and not rely on the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> properties to change it.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议你始终将主应用程序线程的区域性设置并不依赖于<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>属性来更改它。

trans-unit.source: Culture and application domains
trans-unit.target: 区域性和应用程序域

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> are static properties that explicitly define a default culture only for the application domain that is current when the property value is set or retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> 和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>是显式定义仅时设置或检索属性值的当前的应用程序域的默认区域性的静态属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the default culture and default UI culture in the default application domain to French (France), and then uses the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> class and the <xref:System.AppDomainInitializer> delegate to set the default culture and UI culture in a new application domain to Russian (Russia).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将默认应用程序域中的默认区域性和默认 UI 区域性设置为法语 （法国），然后使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>类和<xref:System.AppDomainInitializer>委托到新应用程序域中设置的默认区域性和 UI 区域性俄语 （俄罗斯）。

trans-unit.source: A single thread then executes two methods in each application domain.
trans-unit.target: 单个线程然后执行每个应用程序域中的两种方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the thread's culture and UI culture are not explicitly set; they are derived from the default culture and UI culture of the application domain in which the thread is executing.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，线程的区域性和 UI 区域性没有显式设置;它们派生而来的默认区域性和 UI 区域性的线程正在执行的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> properties return the default <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> values of the application domain that is current when the method call is made.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>属性返回的默认<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>是进行方法调用时当前的应用程序域的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cultures and application domains, see the "Application Domains and Threads" section in the topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关区域文化和应用程序域的详细信息，请参阅主题中的"应用程序域和线程"部分。

trans-unit.source: Culture and task-based asynchronous operations
trans-unit.target: 区域性和基于任务的异步操作

trans-unit.source: The [task-based asynchronous programming pattern](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md) uses <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> objects to asynchronously execute delegates on thread pool threads.
trans-unit.target: [基于任务的异步编程模式](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>和<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>异步执行委托的对象的线程池线程。

trans-unit.source: The specific thread on which a particular task runs is not known in advance, but is determined only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在其运行的特定任务的特定线程提前，不知道，但只能在运行时确定。

trans-unit.source: For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or later versions, culture is part of an asynchronous operation's context.
trans-unit.target: 对于面向的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更高版本，区域性是异步操作的上下文的一部分。

trans-unit.source: In other words, starting with apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], asynchronous operations by default inherit the values of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A> properties of the thread from which they are launched.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，从应用开始面向[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，异步操作，默认情况下的继承的值<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A>程序在启动时的线程的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the current culture or current UI culture differs from the system culture, the current culture crosses thread boundaries and becomes the current culture of the thread pool thread that is executing an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前区域性或当前 UI 区域性不同于系统区域性，当前区域性跨线程边界的部署，将执行异步操作的线程池线程的当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides a simple illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提供了简单的演示。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute> attribute to target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 它使用<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute>特性应用到目标[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a <xref:System.Func%601> delegate, `formatDelegate`, that returns some numbers formatted as currency values.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了<xref:System.Func%601>委托， `formatDelegate`，返回一些数字，格式化为货币值。

trans-unit.source: The example changes the current system culture to either French (France) or, if French (France) is already the current culture, English (United States).
trans-unit.target: 该示例将当前的系统区域性更改为 French (France) 或者法语 （法国） 已为当前区域性，英语 （美国）。

trans-unit.source: It then:
trans-unit.target: 然后它：

trans-unit.source: Invokes the delegate directly so that it runs synchronously on the main app thread.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用的委托，以便它在主应用程序线程上同步运行。

trans-unit.source: Creates a task that executes the delegate asynchronously on a thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个线程池线程异步执行委托的任务。

trans-unit.source: Creates a task that executes the delegate synchronously on the main app thread by calling the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个任务，该委托线程上同步执行主应用程序通过调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunSynchronously%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, when the current culture is changed to French (France), the current culture of the thread from which tasks are invoked asynchronously becomes the current culture for that asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 如示例输出所示，当前区域性更改为法语 （法国） 时任务以异步方式调用从中的线程的当前区域性将成为该异步操作的当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], or for apps that do not target a particular version of the .NET Framework, the culture of the calling thread is not part of a task's context.
trans-unit.target: 对于面向.NET Framework，之前版本的应用， [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，或者对于不面向特定版本的.NET framework 的应用程序，调用线程的区域性不是任务的上下文的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Instead, unless one is explicitly defined, the culture of new threads by default is the system culture.
trans-unit.target: 相反，除非已显式定义，默认情况下的新线程的区域性是系统区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example, which is identical to the previous example except that it lacks the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute> attribute, illustrates this.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例中，这是与前面的示例相同，只不过它缺少<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute>特性，阐释了这一点。

trans-unit.source: Because the system culture of the system on which the example executed was English (United States), the culture of the task that executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread is en-US rather than fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: 执行该示例的系统区域性为英语 （美国），因为在线程池线程上异步执行的任务的区域性是系统的 EN-US，而不是系统的 fr 法属

trans-unit.source: For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework from the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] and later but prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], you can use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> properties to ensure that the culture of the calling thread is used in asynchronous tasks that execute on thread pool threads.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 目标版本的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]和更高版本，但之前[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，你可以使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>属性，以确保调用线程的区域性采用异步任务在线程池线程上执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example is identical to the previous example, except that it uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> property to ensure that thread pool threads have the same culture as the main app thread.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是前面的示例相同，但它使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A>属性以确保该线程池线程具有与主应用程序线程相同的区域性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A> are per-app domain properties; that is, they establish a default culture for all threads not explicitly assigned a culture in a specific application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentCulture%2A> 和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DefaultThreadCurrentUICulture%2A>是每个应用程序域属性; 即，它们建立默认区域性，所有线程未显式分配的区域性特定的应用程序域中。

trans-unit.source: However, for apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or later, the culture of the calling thread remains part of an asynchronous task's context even if the task crosses app domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 但是，对于面向的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更高版本，调用线程的区域性保持异步任务的上下文的一部分，即使是跨应用程序域边界的任务。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that the calling thread's culture remains the current culture of a task-based asynchronous operation even if the method that the task is executing crosses application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示调用线程的区域性保持当前区域性的基于任务的异步操作，即使在执行任务的方法是跨应用程序域边界。

trans-unit.source: It defines a class, `DataRetriever`, with a single method, `GetFormattedNumber`, that returns a random double-precision floating-point number between 1 and 1,000 formatted as a currency value.
trans-unit.target: 它定义了一个类`DataRetriever`，与一个方法， `GetFormattedNumber`，介于 1 和 1000 格式化为货币值之间返回一个随机的双精度浮点数。

trans-unit.source: A first task is run that simply instantiates a `DataRetriever` instance and calls its `GetFormattedNumber` method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个任务运行，只需实例化`DataRetriever`实例并调用其`GetFormattedNumber`方法。

trans-unit.source: A second task reports its current application domain, creates a new application domain, instantiates a `DataRetriever` instance in the new application domain, and calls its `GetFormattedNumber` method.
trans-unit.target: 第二个任务报告其当前的应用程序域、 创建新的应用程序域、 实例化`DataRetriever`实例中新的应用程序域，并调用其`GetFormattedNumber`方法。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, the current culture has remained the same in the calling thread, the first task, and the second task both when it was executing in the main application domain and the second application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如示例输出所示，当前区域性一直在调用线程，第一个任务和第二个任务都相同当它在执行主要应用程序域和第二个应用程序域中时。

trans-unit.source: CultureInfo object serialization
trans-unit.target: CultureInfo 对象序列化

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object is serialized, all that is actually stored is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>序列化对象时，所有实际存储是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>。

trans-unit.source: It is successfully de-serialized only in an environment where that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A> has the same meaning.
trans-unit.target: 它是已成功执行反序列仅在环境中化其中的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A>具有相同的含义。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show why this is not always the case:
trans-unit.target: 下面的三个示例演示这为什么不是始终这种情况：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A> property value is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and if that culture was first introduced in Windows Vista or a later version of the Windows operating system, it is not possible to de-serialize it on Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A>属性值是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>，并且如果在 Windows Vista 或更高版本的 Windows 操作系统中首次引入该区域性不可能进行反 Windows XP 上序列化。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the culture was first introduced in Windows XP Service Pack 2, it is not possible to de-serialize it for a Windows XP system on which the culture has not been installed.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果在 Windows XP Service Pack 2 中首次引入区域性不能以反序列化 Windows XP 系统尚未在其上安装的区域性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A> value is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the computer on which it is de-serialized does not have this user custom culture installed, it is not possible to de-serialize it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A>值是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>，并在其正在执行反序列化的计算机没有安装此用户自定义区域性，不能进行反序列化。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A> value is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the computer on which it is de-serialized does not have this replacement culture, it de-serializes to the same name, but not all of the same characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CultureTypes%2A>值是<xref:System.Globalization.CultureTypes?displayProperty=nameWithType>，并在其正在执行反序列化的计算机不具有此替换区域性，其反序列化为相同的名称，但不是所有相同的特征。

trans-unit.source: For example, if en-US is a replacement culture on computer A, but not on computer B, and if a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object referring to this culture is serialized on computer A and de-serialized on computer B, then none of the custom characteristics of the culture are transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 EN-US 替换区域性在计算机 A，但不是能在计算机 B，并且<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象引用此区域性是在计算机 A 上序列化和反序列化： 计算机 B 上，将无区域性的自定义特征传输。

trans-unit.source: The culture de-serializes successfully, but with a different meaning.
trans-unit.target: 区域性反序列化成功，但具有不同的含义。

trans-unit.source: Control Panel overrides
trans-unit.target: 控制面板重写

trans-unit.source: The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择重写某些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的当前区域性关联的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用区域性而不是默认货币。

trans-unit.source: In general, your applications should honor these user overrides.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，你的应用程序应遵循这些用户重写。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A> is `true` and the specified culture matches the current culture of Windows, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property, and the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>是`true`和指定的区域性匹配的 Windows 中，当前区域性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用上述重写值，其中包括的属性的用户设置<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回实例<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>属性，和属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回实例<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>, the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户设置均与关联的区域性不兼容<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，例如，如果所选的日历不是一个<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>，这些方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。

trans-unit.source: Alternate sort orders
trans-unit.target: 替换排序顺序

trans-unit.source: Some cultures support more than one sort order.
trans-unit.target: 某些区域性支持多个排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: The Spanish (Spain) culture has two sort orders: the default international sort order, and the traditional sort order.
trans-unit.target: 西班牙语 （西班牙） 区域性都有两种排序顺序： 默认的国际排序顺序，以及的传统的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the es-ES culture name, the international sort order is used.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象 ES-ES 区域性名称，则使用国际排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the es-ES-tradnl culture name, the traditional sort order is used.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象为 es ES tradnl 区域性名称，则使用传统的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: The zh-CN (Chinese (Simplified, PRC)) culture supports two sort orders: by pronunciation (the default) and by stroke count.
trans-unit.target: ZH-CN （中文 （简体，中国）） 区域性支持两种排序顺序： 按发音 （默认值） 和按笔画数。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the zh-CN culture name, the default sort order is used.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象 ZH-CN 区域性名称，则使用默认排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with a local identifier of 0x00020804, strings are sorted by stroke count.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象 0x00020804，本地标识符的字符串排序按笔画数。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the cultures that support alternate sort orders and the identifiers for the default and alternate sort orders.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了支持的默认实例和替换排序顺序的替换排序顺序和标识符的区域性。

The current culture and UWP apps
trans-unit.target: 当前区域性和 UWP 应用

trans-unit.source: In Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A> properties are read-write, just as they are in .NET Framework and .NET Core apps.
trans-unit.target: 在通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用中，<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A>属性是读写，就像它们是.NET Framework 和.NET 核心应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: However, UWP apps recognize a single culture.
trans-unit.target: 但是，UWP 应用识别单个区域性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A> properties map to the first value in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A>属性映射到中的第一个值[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)集合。

trans-unit.source: In .NET Framework and .NET Core apps, the current culture is a per-thread setting, and the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A> properties reflect the culture and UI culture of the current thread only.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 和.NET 核心应用程序，当前区域性为每个线程设置，和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A>属性反映的区域性和 UI 区域性的当前线程。

trans-unit.source: In UWP apps, the current culture maps to the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection, which is a global setting.
trans-unit.target: 在 UWP 应用中，当前区域性映射到[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)集合，这是全局设置。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A> property changes the culture of the entire app; culture cannot be set on a per-thread basis.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture%2A>属性更改整个应用程序的区域性; 无法在每个线程基础上设置区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object for Spanish (Spain) with the international sort and another <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object with the traditional sort.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>西班牙语 （西班牙） 使用国际排序和另一个对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用传统的排序的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A predefined <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> identifier, <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID" /> property of an existing <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object, or Windows-only culture identifier.
trans-unit.target: 预定义的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 标识符、现有 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID" /> 属性或仅 Windows 区域性标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> class based on the culture specified by the culture identifier.
trans-unit.target: 根据区域性标识符指定的区域性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Predefined culture identifiers are listed in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
trans-unit.target: 中列出了预定义的区域性标识符[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the `culture` parameter is mapped to the corresponding National Language Support (NLS) locale identifier.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，`culture`参数映射到相应的区域语言支持 (NLS) 区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `culture` parameter becomes the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A> property of the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 值`culture`参数成为的值<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A>属性的新<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you call the locale name constructor <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, because locale names are preferable to LCIDs.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你调用的区域设置名称构造函数<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是因为区域设置名称要优于 Lcid。

trans-unit.source: For custom locales, a locale name is required.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义区域设置，区域设置名称是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择重写某些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的当前区域性关联的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用区域性而不是默认货币。

trans-unit.source: If the specified culture identifier matches the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property, and the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的区域性标识符与当前的 Windows 区域性的区域性标识符匹配，此构造函数创建<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用上述重写值，其中包括的属性的用户设置<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回实例<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>属性和的属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回实例<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> (for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>) the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户设置均与关联的区域性不兼容<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>(例如，如果所选的日历不是一个<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>) 方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。

trans-unit.source: If the specified culture identifier does not match the identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that uses the default values for the specified culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的区域性标识符与当前的 Windows 区域性标识符不匹配，此构造函数创建<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，它使用默认值为指定的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A> property is always set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>属性始终设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that Arabic (Saudi Arabia) is the current Windows culture and the user has changed the calendar from Hijri to Gregorian.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设阿拉伯语 （沙特阿拉伯） 是 Windows 当前区域性，并且用户已日历回历从更改为公历。

trans-unit.source: With `CultureInfo("0x0401")` (culture name ar-SA), <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> is set to <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> (which is the user setting) and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 与`CultureInfo("0x0401")`（区域性名称 AR-SA）<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>设置为<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>（这是用户设置） 和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: With `CultureInfo("0x041E")` (culture name th-TH), <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> is set to <xref:System.Globalization.ThaiBuddhistCalendar> (which is the default calendar for th-TH) and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 与`CultureInfo("0x041E")`（区域性名称 th TH）<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>设置为<xref:System.Globalization.ThaiBuddhistCalendar>（这是个 TH 的默认日历） 和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: For cultures that use the euro, the .NET Framework and Windows XP set the default currency as euro.
trans-unit.target: 对于使用欧元的区域性，.NET Framework 和 Windows XP 则设置为欧元默认货币。

trans-unit.source: However, older versions of Windows do not.
trans-unit.target: 但是，较旧版本的 Windows 不这样做。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if the user of an older version of Windows has not changed the currency setting through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel, the currency might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的货币设置未更改的较旧版本的 Windows 用户，货币可能不正确。

trans-unit.source: To use the .NET Framework default setting for the currency, the application should use a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor overload that accepts a `useUserOverride` parameter and set it to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的货币和.NET Framework 默认设置，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>构造函数重载接受的`useUserOverride`参数并将其设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: For backwards compatibility, a culture constructed using a `culture` parameter of 0x0004 or 0x7c04 will have a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A> property of zh-CHS or zh-CHT, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 有关向后兼容性，构造使用的区域性`culture`0x0004 或 0x7c04 的参数将具有<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name%2A>属性 ZH-CHS 或 ZH-CHT，分别。

trans-unit.source: You should instead prefer to construct the culture using the current standard culture names of zh-Hans or zh-Hant, unless you have a reason for using the older names.
trans-unit.target: 应改为想要构造使用中文 Hans 或此不同的当前标准区域性名称的区域性，除非你有使用较旧名称的原因。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="culture" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="culture" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="culture" /> is not a valid culture identifier.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="culture" /> 不是有效的区域性标识符。

trans-unit.source: See the Notes to Callers section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“调用方备注”部分。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> if <paramref name="culture" /> is not a valid culture identifier.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]和早期版本抛<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />如果<paramref name="culture" />不是有效的区域性标识符。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this constructor throws a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" />.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此构造函数引发<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object whose identifier is <paramref name="culture" /> from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, the method throws a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" /> exception.
trans-unit.target: 从下运行的应用开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更高版本 Windows 7 或更高版本，该方法尝试检索<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />对象，其标识符为<paramref name="culture" />从操作系统; 如果操作系统不支持该区域性，方法引发<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" />异常。

trans-unit.source: A predefined <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> name, <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name" /> of an existing <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />, or Windows-only culture name.
trans-unit.target: 预定义的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 名称、现有 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Name" /> 或仅 Windows 区域性名称。

trans-unit.source: <c>name</c> is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: <c>name</c> 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> class based on the culture specified by name.
trans-unit.target: 根据由名称指定的区域性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
trans-unit.target: 有关预定义的区域性名称的列表，请参阅[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。

trans-unit.source: In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag.
trans-unit.target: 此外，从 Windows 10 开始`name`可以是任何有效的 bcp-47 语言标记。

trans-unit.source: If `name` is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the constructor creates an instance of the invariant culture; this is equivalent to retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`name`是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>，构造函数创建固定区域性的实例; 这等效于检索的值的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择重写某些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的当前区域性关联的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用区域性而不是默认货币。

trans-unit.source: If the culture identifier associated with `name` matches the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that uses those overrides, including user settings for the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property, and the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> instance returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果与关联的区域性标识符`name`匹配项的当前 Windows 区域性，此构造函数的区域性标识符创建<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，它使用上述重写值，其中包括用户设置的属性的<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回实例<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>属性和的属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回实例<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>, the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户设置均与关联的区域性不兼容<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，例如，如果所选的日历不是一个<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>，这些方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。

trans-unit.source: If the culture identifier associated with `name` does not match the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this constructor creates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that uses the default values for the specified culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果与关联的区域性标识符`name`不匹配当前的 Windows 区域性，此构造函数的区域性标识符创建<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用默认值为指定的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A> property is always set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>属性始终设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that Arabic (Saudi Arabia) is the current culture of Windows and the user changed the calendar from Hijri to Gregorian.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设阿拉伯语 （沙特阿拉伯） 是 Windows 的当前区域性，并且用户可更改回历为公历日历。

trans-unit.source: With `CultureInfo("ar-SA")`, <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> is set to <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> (which is the user setting) and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 与`CultureInfo("ar-SA")`，<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>设置为<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>（这是用户设置） 和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: With `CultureInfo("th-TH")`, <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> is set to <xref:System.Globalization.ThaiBuddhistCalendar> (which is the default calendar for th-TH) and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 与`CultureInfo("th-TH")`，<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>设置为<xref:System.Globalization.ThaiBuddhistCalendar>（这是个 TH 的默认日历） 和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A> property of the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is set to the culture identifier associated with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A>属性的新<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>设置为具有指定名称关联的区域性标识符。

trans-unit.source: For cultures that use the euro, the .NET Framework and Windows XP set the default currency as euro.
trans-unit.target: 对于使用欧元的区域性，.NET Framework 和 Windows XP 则设置为欧元默认货币。

trans-unit.source: However, older versions of Windows do not do this.
trans-unit.target: 但是，较旧版本的 Windows 不这样做。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if the user of an older version of Windows has not changed the currency setting through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel, the currency might be incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分的货币设置未更改的较旧版本的 Windows 用户，货币可能不正确。

trans-unit.source: To use the .NET Framework default setting for the currency, the application should use a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor overload that accepts a `useUserOverride` parameter and set it to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的货币和.NET Framework 默认设置，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>构造函数重载接受的`useUserOverride`参数并将其设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: If it is anything other than the French (France) culture, it calls the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor to instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the French (France) culture and makes it the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是法语 （法国） 区域性之外的任何内容，则会调用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示法语 （法国） 区域性，并使其成为当前线程区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it instantiates a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the French (Luxembourg) culture and makes it the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它实例化<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示法语 （卢森堡） 区域性，并使其成为当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 null。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is not a valid culture name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 不是有效的区域性名称。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Notes to Callers section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“对调用方的说明”部分。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] and earlier versions throw an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" /> if <paramref name="name" /> is not a valid culture name.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]和早期版本抛<see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />如果<paramref name="name" />不是有效的区域性名称。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this constructor throws a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" />.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，此构造函数引发<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with apps that run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] or later on Windows 7 or later, the method attempts to retrieve a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object whose identifier is <paramref name="name" /> from the operating system; if the operating system does not support that culture, and if <paramref name="name" /> is not the name of a supplementary or replacement culture, the method throws a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" /> exception.
trans-unit.target: 从下运行的应用开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]或更高版本 Windows 7 或更高版本，该方法尝试检索<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />对象，其标识符为<paramref name="name" />从操作系统; 如果操作系统不支持该区域性，并且<paramref name="name" />不是补充或替换的区域性，则方法将引发名称<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException" />异常。

trans-unit.source: A predefined <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> identifier, <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID" /> property of an existing <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object, or Windows-only culture identifier.
trans-unit.target: 预定义的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 标识符、现有 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID" /> 属性或仅 Windows 区域性标识符。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean that denotes whether to use the user-selected culture settings (<see langword="true" />) or the default culture settings (<see langword="false" />).
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，它指示是使用用户选定的区域性设置 (<see langword="true" />)，还是使用默认区域性设置 (<see langword="false" />)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> class based on the culture specified by the culture identifier and on the Boolean that specifies whether to use the user-selected culture settings from the system.
trans-unit.target: 基于区域性标识符指定的区域性并基于布尔值（指定是否使用系统中用户选定的区域性设置）来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Predefined culture identifiers are listed in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
trans-unit.target: 中列出了预定义的区域性标识符[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the `culture` parameter is mapped to the corresponding National Language Support (NLS) locale identifier.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，`culture`参数映射到相应的区域语言支持 (NLS) 区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `culture` parameter becomes the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A> property of the new <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 值`culture`参数成为的值<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID%2A>属性的新<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you call the locale name constructor <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, because locale names are preferable to LCIDs.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你调用的区域设置名称构造函数<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是因为区域设置名称要优于 Lcid。

trans-unit.source: For custom locales, a locale name is required.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义区域设置，区域设置名称是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The user might choose to override some of the values associated with the current culture of Windows through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择重写某些与 Windows 通过控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的当前区域性关联的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用区域性而不是默认货币。

trans-unit.source: Applications should typically not disallow user overrides.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序通常应不禁止用户重写。

trans-unit.source: Note that disallowing overrides does not itself guarantee data stability; see the blog entry [Culture data shouldn't be considered stable (except for Invariant)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=156850).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不允许重写不本身保证数据稳定性;请参阅博客文章[区域性数据不应视为稳定 （除外固定的）](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=156850)。
